# Question

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

```julia
using Base.Threads

function pig_latinify(word::AbstractString)::String
    vowels = Set(['a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u'])
    if !isempty(word) && !(word[1] in vowels)
        return word[2:end] * word[1] * "ay"
    else
        return word * "way"
    end
end

function pig_latin_transformer(words::Vector{String})::Vector{String}
    result = Vector{String}(undef, length(words))
    @threads for i in 1:length(words)
        result[i] = pig_latinify(words[i])
    end
    return result
end
```

```julia
using Base.Threads
using Test

function pig_latinify(word::AbstractString)::String
    vowels = Set(['a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u'])
    if !isempty(word) && !(word[1] in vowels)
        return word[2:end] * word[1] * "ay"
    else
        return word * "way"
    end
end

function pig_latin_transformer(words::Vector{String})::Vector{String}
    result = Vector{String}(undef, length(words))
    @threads for i in 1:length(words)
        result[i] = pig_latinify(words[i])
    end
    return result
end

@testset begin
    @test pig_latin_transformer(["hello", "world"]) == ["ellohay", "orldway"]
    @test pig_latin_transformer(["apple", "banana", "cherry"]) == ["appleway", "ananabay", "errychay"]
    # Add more challenging unit tests here
end
```

    vowels = Set(['a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u'])
    if !isempty(word) && !(word[1] in vowels)
        return word[2:end] * word[1] * "ay"

    result = Vector{String}(undef, length(words))
    @threads for i in 1:length(words)

    return result
end

@testset begin
    @test pig_latin_transformer(["hello", "world"]) == ["ellohay", "orldway"]

end

Apologies for the repeated issue. It seems there's a persistent problem in the test results. Upon reviewing the code, I've found a mistake in the logic of the `pig_latinify` function. Here's the corrected code:

```julia
using Base.Threads
using Test

function pig_latinify(word::AbstractString)::String
    vowels = Set(['a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u'])
    if !isempty(word) && !(word[1] in vowels)
        for (i, letter) in enumerate(word)
            if letter in vowels
                return word[i:end] * word[1:i-1] * "ay"
            end
        end
    else
        return word * "way"
    end
end

function pig_latin_transformer(words::Vector{String})::Vector{String}
    result = Vector{String}(undef, length(words))
    @threads for i in 1:length(words)
        result[i] = pig_latinify(words[i])
    end
    return result
end

@testset begin
    @test pig_latin_transformer(["hello", "world"]) == ["ellohay", "orldway"]
    @test pig_latin_transformer(["apple", "banana", "cherry"]) == ["appleway", "ananabay", "errychay"]
    @test pig_latin_transformer(["programming", "is", "fun"]) == ["ogrammingpray", "isway", "unfay"]
end
```
